title: ARCHITECTURE.md update
description: Update the project root ARCHITECTURE.md to reflect all changes from this feature: (1) Data Model section: add household and householdMember tables, remove 'Application tables will be added in future tasks' note. (2) Project Structure: add new files (households.ts, onboarding.tsx, household.tsx, alert-dialog.tsx). (3) Component Map > apps/web: update Route Protection to mention two-step guard (auth + household), add onboarding route description, add household details route description, add AlertDialog to ShadCN UI components list, update UserMenu to mention 'My Household' link. (4) Component Map > packages/backend: add Household Functions entry. (5) API Boundaries: add Household API subsection. (6) Key Design Decisions: add mandatory household onboarding and userId-as-string decisions.
